ai-tha-ap279:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap279:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap279:2.2_0: the needles banner of the Yamunā,
ai-tha-ap279:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap279:3.1_0: Seven measures have been strayed for seven eons.
ai-tha-ap279:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṇḍolabhāradvāja.
ai-tha-ap279:6.1_0: the seventh section on the Divine Cūḷaka,
